comment: Considering myself exceedingly lucky. Aside from sleeping the entire weekend, the side effects I experienced were minimal. My friend who received their nd vaccine the same day had a horrible weekend & is still miserable. So, hope for the best but expect the worst
amr:
# ::snt Considering myself exceedingly lucky. Aside from sleeping the entire weekend, the side effects I experienced were minimal. My friend who received their nd vaccine the same day had a horrible weekend & is still miserable. So, hope for the best but expect the worst
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / consider-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (l / lucky
                  :degree (e / exceedingly)
                  :domain ii))
      :snt2 (m2 / minimal-02
            :ARG1 (e2 / effect
                  :mod (s / side)
                  :ARG1-of (e3 / experience-01
                        :ARG0 (ii2 / i)))
            :ARG2-of (e4 / except-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / sleep-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :time (w / weekend
                              :mod (e5 / entire)))))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 (ii3 / i)
                              :ARG2 (f / friend))
                        :ARG0-of (r / receive-01
                              :ARG1 (v / vaccine
                                    :mod (p2 / product
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "ND")))
                              :time (d / day
                                    :ARG1-of (s3 / same-01))))
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (w2 / weekend
                              :mod (h3 / horrible))
                        :op2 (a3 / amp)))
            :op2 (m3 / miserable
                  :mod (s4 / still)))
      :snt4 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (h4 / hope-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (h5 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (g / good-02
                                    :ARG1 t)
                              :ARG3 (m4 / most))))
            :ARG2 (e6 / expect-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                        :ARG1-of (h6 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (b / bad-02
                                    :ARG1 t2)
                              :ARG3 (m5 / most))))))

comment: THANKS! Im taking today, tomorrow, & Monday off, just in case. So far, Ive drank lots of water, napped, read, & tweeted. I adlore the idea of my immune system flashing into action!!!!

comment: Dressing for comfort. No gown & tiara. Glamming it up by wearing blue eyeliner to match my mermaid socks. Thought of wearing glitter powder but thought if I sparkle, they'll take me in for turning into a vampire.
